translations.## Welcome to Nextcloud Talk!\nIn this c:
## Karibu kwenye Nextcloud Talk!
Katika mazungumzo haya utaarifiwa kuhusu vipengele vipya vinavyopatikana katika Nextcloud Talk.
translations.- Microsoft Edge and Safari can now be u: - Microsoft Edge na Safari sasa zinaweza kutumika kushiriki katika simu za sauti na video
translations.- One-to-one conversations are now persi: - Mazungumzo ya mmoja-mmoja sasa yanaendelea na hayawezi kugeuzwa kuwa mazungumzo ya kikundi kwa bahati mbaya tena. Pia wakati mmoja wa washiriki anaondoka kwenye mazungumzo, mazungumzo hayafutwa kiotomatiki tena. Ikiwa tu washiriki wote wawili wataondoka, mazungumzo yanafutwa kutoka kwa seva
translations.- You can now notify all participants by: - Sasa unaweza kuwaarifu washiriki wote kwa kuchapisha "@wote" kwenye gumzo
translations.- With the \"arrow-up\" key you can repo: - Kwa kitufe cha "mshale-juu" unaweza kutuma tena ujumbe wako wa mwisho
translations.- Talk can now have commands, send \"/he: - Talk sasa inaweza kuwa na amri, kutuma "/msaada" kama ujumbe wa gumzo ili kuona kama msimamizi wako alisanidi baadhi
translations.- With projects you can create quick lin: - Kwa miradi unaweza kuunda viungo vya haraka kati ya mazungumzo, faili na vitu vingine
translations.- You can now mention guests in the chat: - Sasa unaweza kutaja wageni kwenye gumzo
translations.- Conversations can now have a lobby. Th: - Mazungumzo sasa yanaweza kuwa na kushawishi. Hii itawaruhusu wasimamizi kujiunga na gumzo na kupiga simu tayari ili kuandaa mkutano, huku watumiaji na wageni wakisubiri
translations.- You can now directly reply to messages: - Sasa unaweza kujibu ujumbe moja kwa moja kuwapa watumiaji wengine muktadha zaidi ujumbe wako unahusu nini
translations.- Searching for conversations and partic: - Kutafuta mazungumzo na washiriki sasa pia kutachuja mazungumzo yako yaliyopo, na kurahisisha kupata mazungumzo ya awali.
translations.- You can now add custom user groups to: - Sasa unaweza kuongeza vikundi maalum vya watumiaji kwenye mazungumzo wakati programu ya miduara imesakinishwa
translations.- Check out the new grid and call view: - Angalia gridi mpya na mtazamo wa simu
translations.- You can now upload and drag'n'drop fil: - Sasa unaweza kupakia na kuburuta faili moja kwa moja kutoka kwa kifaa chako hadi kwenye gumzo
translations.- Shared files are now opened directly i: - Faili zinazoshirikiwa sasa zinafunguliwa moja kwa moja ndani ya mwonekano wa gumzo na programu za watazamaji
translations.- You can now search for chats and messa: - Sasa unaweza kutafuta gumzo na ujumbe katika utafutaji uliounganishwa kwenye upau wa juu
translations.- Spice up your messages with emojis fro: - Ongeza ujumbe wako kwa emojis kutoka kwa kichagua emoji
translations.- You can now change your camera and mic: - Sasa unaweza kubadilisha kamera na maikrofoni yako ukiwa kwenye simu
translations.- Give your conversations some context w: - Yape mazungumzo yako muktadha fulani kwa maelezo na uufungue ili watumiaji walioingia waweze kuupata na wajiunge wenyewe
translations.- See a read status and send failed mess: - Angalia hali ya kusoma na kutuma ujumbe kushindwa tena
translations.- Raise your hand in a call with the R k: - Inua mkono wako kwenye simu kwa kutumia kitufe cha R
translations.- Join the same conversation and call fr: - Jiunge na mazungumzo sawa na upige simu kutoka kwa vifaa vingi
translations.- Send voice messages, share your locati: - Tuma ujumbe wa sauti, shiriki eneo lako au maelezo ya mawasiliano
translations.- Add groups to a conversation and new g: - Ongeza vikundi kwenye mazungumzo na washiriki wapya wa kikundi wataongezwa kiotomatiki kama washiriki
translations.- A preview of your audio and video is s: - Onyesho la kukagua sauti na video yako huonyeshwa kabla ya kujiunga kwenye simu
translations.- You can now blur your background in th: - Sasa unaweza kutia ukungu mandharinyuma katika mwonekano mpya wa simu ulioundwa
translations.- Moderators can now assign general and: - Wasimamizi sasa wanaweza kutoa ruhusa za jumla na za kibinafsi kwa washiriki
translations.- You can now react to chat messages: - Sasa unaweza kujibu ujumbe wa gumzo
translations.- In the sidebar you can now find an ove: - Katika utepe sasa unaweza kupata muhtasari wa vipengee vya hivi punde vilivyoshirikiwa
translations.- Use a poll to collect the opinions of: - Tumia kura ya maoni kukusanya maoni ya wengine au kusuluhisha tarehe
translations.- Configure an expiration time for chat: - Sanidi muda wa mwisho wa ujumbe wa gumzo
translations.- Start calls without notifying others i: - Anzisha simu bila kuwaarifu wengine katika mazungumzo makubwa. Unaweza kutuma arifa za simu mahususi punde tu simu imeanza.
translations.- Send chat messages without notifying t: - Tuma ujumbe wa gumzo bila kuwaarifu wapokeaji ikiwa sio haraka
translations.- Emojis can now be autocompleted by typ: - Emoji sasa zinaweza kukamilishwa kiotomatiki kwa kuandika ":"
translations.- Link various items using the new smart: - Unganisha vipengee mbalimbali kwa kutumia kichaguzi mahiri kwa kuandika "/"
translations.- Moderators can now create breakout roo: - Wasimamizi sasa wanaweza kuunda vyumba vifupi (inahitaji hali ya nyuma ya utendaji wa Juu)
translations.- Calls can now be recorded (requires th: - Simu sasa zinaweza kurekodiwa (inahitaji hali ya nyuma ya utendaji wa hali ya juu)
translations.- Conversations can now have an avatar o: - Mazungumzo sasa yanaweza kuwa na avatar au emoji kama ikoni
translations.- Virtual backgrounds are now available: - Mandhari pepe sasa yanapatikana pamoja na mandharinyuma yenye ukungu katika simu za video
translations.- Reactions are now available during cal: - Majibu sasa yanapatikana wakati wa simu
translations.- Typing indicators show which users are: - Viashirio vya kuandika vinaonyesha ni watumiaji gani wanaandika ujumbe kwa sasa
translations.- Groups can now be mentioned in chats: - Vikundi sasa vinaweza kutajwa kwenye gumzo
translations.- Call recordings are automatically tran: - Rekodi za simu hunakiliwa kiotomatiki ikiwa programu ya mtoaji wa unukuzi imesajiliwa
translations.- Chat messages can be translated if a t: - Ujumbe wa gumzo unaweza kutafsiriwa ikiwa programu ya mtoaji tafsiri imesajiliwa
translations.- Webhooks are now available to implemen: - Webhooks sasa zinapatikana kutekeleza roboti. Tazama hati kwa habari zaidi https://nextcloud-talk.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bot-list/
translations.- Set a reminder on a chat message to be: - Weka kikumbusho kwenye ujumbe wa gumzo ili kuarifiwa baadaye tena
translations.- Use the **Note to self** conversation: - Tumia mazungumzo ya **Dokezo la kibinafsi** kuandika madokezo na kushiriki habari kati ya vifaa vyako
translations.- Captions allow to send a message with: - Manukuu yanaruhusu kutuma ujumbe na faili kwa wakati mmoja
translations.- Video of the speaker is now visible wh: - Video ya spika sasa inaonekana wakati unashiriki skrini na majibu ya simu yanahuishwa
translations.- Messages can now be edited by logged-i: - Ujumbe sasa unaweza kuhaririwa na waandishi na wasimamizi walioingia kwa saa 6
translations.- Unsent message drafts are now saved in: - Rasimu za ujumbe ambao haujatumwa sasa zimehifadhiwa kwenye kivinjari chako
translations.- Text chatting can now be done in a fed: - Gumzo la maandishi sasa linaweza kufanywa kwa njia iliyoshirikishwa na seva zingine za Talk
translations.- Moderators can now ban accounts and gu: - Wasimamizi sasa wanaweza kupiga marufuku akaunti na wageni ili kuwazuia kujiunga tena na mazungumzo
translations.- Upcoming calls from linked calendar ev: - Simu zinazokuja kutoka kwa matukio ya kalenda zilizounganishwa na uingizwaji wa nje ya ofisi sasa zinaonyeshwa kwenye mazungumzo
translations.- Calls can now be done in a federated w: - Simu sasa zinaweza kufanywa kwa njia iliyoshirikishwa na seva zingine za Talk (inahitaji hali ya nyuma ya utendaji wa Juu)
translations.- Introducing the Nextcloud Talk desktop: - Tunakuletea mteja wa eneo-kazi la Nextcloud Talk kwa Windows, macOS na Linux: %s
translations.- Summarize call recordings and unread m: - Fanya muhtasari wa rekodi za simu na ujumbe ambao haujasomwa kwenye gumzo na Msaidizi wa Nextcloud
translations.- Improved meetings with recognizing gue: - Mikutano iliyoboreshwa ya kuwatambua wageni walioalikwa kupitia anwani zao za barua pepe, uingizaji wa orodha za washiriki, rasimu za kura na kupakua orodha za washiriki wa simu
translations.- Schedule a meeting into your calendar: - Panga mkutano katika kalenda yako kutoka ndani ya mazungumzo
translations.- Search for messages of the current con: - Tafuta ujumbe wa mazungumzo ya sasa moja kwa moja kwenye upau wa kando wa kulia
translations.- See more conversations on a first glan: - Tazama mazungumzo zaidi kwa mtazamo wa kwanza na orodha mpya iliyounganishwa (washa katika mipangilio ya Majadiliano)
translations.- Meeting conversations now sync the tit: - Mazungumzo ya mkutano sasa yanasawazisha kichwa na maelezo kutoka kwa kalenda na yanafichwa na kichujio cha utafutaji hadi yatakapokaribia kuanza.
translations.- Mark conversations as sensitive in the: - Weka alama kwenye mazungumzo kuwa nyeti katika mipangilio ya arifa, ili kuficha maudhui ya ujumbe kutoka kwa orodha ya mazungumzo na arifa
translations.- To receive push notifications during \: - Ili kupokea arifa zinazotumwa na programu hata wakati huitumii wakati wa "Do not disturb", weka alama kwenye mazungumzo kuwa muhimu
translations.- Add other participants to a one-to-one: - Ongeza washiriki wengine kwenye simu ya mmoja-kwa-mmoja ili kuunda simu mpya ya kikundi kwa kuruka
translations.{actor} renamed the conversation from \": {actor} alibadilisha jina la mazungumzo kutoka "%1$s" mpaka "%2$s"
translations.You renamed the conversation from \"%1$s: Ulibadilisha jina la mazungumzo kutoka "%1$s" mpaka "%2$s"
translations.An administrator renamed the conversatio: An administrator renamed the conversation from "%1$s" to "%2$s"
translations.{actor} limited the conversation to the: {actor} amepunguza mazungumzo kwa washiriki wa sasa
translations.You limited the conversation to the curr: Umeweka mazungumzo kwa washiriki wa sasa
translations.An administrator limited the conversatio: Msimamizi alizuia mazungumzo kwa washiriki wa sasa
translations.An administrator opened the conversation: Msimamizi alifungua mazungumzo kwa watumiaji waliojiandikisha
translations.{actor} opened the conversation to regis: {actor} alifungua mazungumzo kwa watumiaji waliojiandikisha na watumiaji walioundwa na programu ya Wageni
translations.You opened the conversation to registere: Umefungua mazungumzo kwa watumiaji na watumiaji waliojiandikisha ulioundwa na programu ya Wageni
translations.An administrator opened the conversation: Msimamizi alifungua mazungumzo kwa watumiaji waliojiandikisha na watumiaji walioundwa na programu ya Wageni
translations.The conversation is now open to everyone: Mazungumzo sasa yako wazi kwa kila mtu
translations.An administrator promoted you to moderat: Msimamizi alikupandisha cheo na kuwa msimamizi
translations.File shares are currently not supported: Ushiriki wa faili kwa sasa hautumiki katika mazungumzo yaliyoshirikishwa
translations.{actor} set up Matterbridge to synchroni: {actor} amesanidi Matterbridge ili kusawazisha mazungumzo haya na gumzo zingine
translations.You set up Matterbridge to synchronize t: Umeweka mipangilio ya Matterbridge ili kusawazisha mazungumzo haya na gumzo zingine

Umeweka muda wa mwisho wa ujumbe kuwa wiki %n
_You set the message expiration to %n da: You set the message expiration to %n day
Umeweka muda wa mwisho wa ujumbe kuwa siku %n
_You set the message expiration to %n ho: You set the message expiration to %n hour
Umeweka muda wa mwisho wa ujumbe kuwa saa %n
_You set the message expiration to %n mi: You set the message expiration to %n minute
Umeweka muda wa mwisho wa ujumbe kuwa dakika %n

translations.{actor} disabled message expiration: {actor} amezima muda wa kuisha kwa ujumbe
translations.You disabled message expiration: Umezima muda wa kuisha kwa ujumbe
translations.Call was ended, as it reached the maximu: Simu ilikatwa, kwani ilifikia upeo wa muda wa simu (Duration {duration})
_Call with %n guest was ended, as it rea: Call with %n guest was ended, as it reached the maximum call duration (Duration {duration})
Simu na %nwageni ilikatishwa, kwa kuwa ilifikia upeo wa muda wa simu (Duration {duration})
translations.Call with {user1} was ended, as it reach: Simu na {user1} ilikamilika, kwani ilifikia upeo wa muda wa simu  (Duration {duration})
translations.Call with {user1} and {user2} was ended,: Simu na {user1} na {user2} ilikamilika, kwani ilifikia upeo wa muda wa simu (Duration {duration})
translations.Call with {user1}, {user2} and {user3} w: Simu na {user1}, {user2}na  {user3} ilikamilika, kwani ilifikia upeo wa muda wa simu (Duration {duration})
translations.Call with {user1}, {user2}, {user3} and: Simu na {user1}, {user2}, {user3} and {user4} ilikamilika, kwani ilifikia upeo wa muda wa simu (Duration {duration})
translations.Call with {user1}, {user2}, {user3}, {us: Simu na {user1}, {user2}, {user3}, {user4} and {user5}ilikamilika, kwani ilifikia upeo wa muda wa simu (Muda {duration})
translations.An error occurred. Please contact your a: Hitilafu imetokea. Tafadhali wasiliana na msimamizi wako.
translations.File is not shared, or shared but not wi: Faili haijashirikiwa, au kushirikiwa lakini sio na mtumiaji
translations.Say hi to your friends and colleagues!: Sema hi kwa marafiki zako na wenzako!
translations.Writes event information into a conversa: Inandika habari ya tukio kwenye mazungumzo unayopenda
translations.Missing email field in header line: Sehemu ya barua pepe inayokosekana katika kichwa cha habari
translations.You can also dial-in via phone with the: Unaweza pia kupiga simu kupitia simu na maelezo yafuatayo
translations.Click the button below to join the lobby: Bofya kitufe kilicho hapa chini ili kujiunga na kushawishi sasa.
translations.Click the link below to join the lobby n: Bofya kiungo hapa chini ili kujiunga na kushawishi sasa.
translations.Click the button below to join the conve: Bofya kitufe kilicho hapa chini ili kujiunga na mazungumzo sasa.
translations.Click the link below to join the convers: Bofya kiungo kilicho hapa chini ili kujiunga na mazungumzo sasa.
translations.The recording server failed to upload re: Seva ya kurekodi imeshindwa kupakia rekodi ya simu {call}. Tafadhali wasiliana na utawala.
translations.The transcript for the call in {call} wa: Nakala ya simu katika {call} ilipakiwa kwa {file}.
translations.The server failed to transcript the reco: Seva imeshindwa kunakili rekodi kwenye {file} kwa simu iliyo katika {call}. Tafadhali wasiliana na utawala.
translations.The summary for the call in {call} was u: Muhtasari wa simu katika {call} ulipakiwa kwenye {file}.
translations.Failed to summarize call recording: Imeshindwa kufanya muhtasari wa kurekodi simu
translations.The server failed to summarize the recor: Seva imeshindwa kufanya muhtasari wa rekodi kwenye {file} kwa simu katika {call}. Tafadhali wasiliana na utawala.
translations.Congo, the Democratic Republic of the: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the

translations.South Georgia and the South Sandwich Isl: Georgia Kusini na Visiwa vya Sandwich kusini
translations.Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da C: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha
translations.Invalid date, date format must be YYYY-M: Tarehe batili, umbizo la tarehe lazima liwe YYYY-MM-DD
translations.Name: Jina
translations.You need to promote a new moderator befo: You need to promote a new moderator before you can leave the conversation
translations.Chat messages can be expired after a cer: Chat messages can be expired after a certain time. Note: Files shared in chat will not be deleted for the owner, but will no longer be shared in the conversation.
translations.\"Do not disturb\" user status is ignore: "Do not disturb" user status is ignored for important conversations
translations.Message preview will be disabled in conv: Message preview will be disabled in conversation list and notifications
translations.Require recording consent before joining: Require recording consent before joining call in this conversation
translations.Recording consent is required for all ca: Recording consent is required for all calls
translations.Question: Swali
translations.Share my read-status and show the read-s: Share my read-status and show the read-status of others
translations.Share my typing-status and show the typi: Share my typing-status and show the typing-status of others
The call has been running for one hour.
translations.Join a conversation or start a new one: Jiunge na mazungumzo au anzisha mapya
translations.The recording failed. Please contact you: The recording failed. Please contact your administrator.
translations.Error while parsing a PROPFIND error: Error while parsing a PROPFIND error
The password is wrong. Try again.
translations.The call summary bot posts an overview m: The call summary bot posts an overview message after the call listing all participants and outlining tasks
